T02D1886:173b-1: aa bhi she ka pra kri yam /
T02D1886:173b-3: dbang gi rab tu byed pa /
T02D1886:173b-4: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1886:173b-5: thog mtha' med cing rtag tu grub //
T02D1886:173b-6: thub pa bde ba chen po'i sku //
T02D1886:173b-7: lhan cig skyes dga' phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D1886:173b-8: dbang gi cho ga gsal bshad bya //
T02D1886:173b-9: de la ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur zhing rjes su gnang ba thob la /
T02D1886:173b-10: ting nge 'dzin gsum la mkhas pa /
T02D1886:173b-11: rig pa bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02D1886:173b-12: rang gi slob ma legs par brtags la /
T02D1886:173b-14: rgyal po dang rkun po la sogs pa'i nye bar
T02D1886:173b-15: 'tshe ba thams cad dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1886:173b-16: khang pa la sogs par cho ga ji lta ba
T02D1886:173b-17: bzhin du rtul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor bri ba'am ras
T02D1886:173b-18: ris kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa rnam pa lngas
T02D1886:173b-19: mchod de / dgongs ka'i dus su bum pa lhag par gnas pa bya'o //
T02D1886:173b-20: rang rang gi mtshan mas brgyan pa bcu dgu'am ;
T02D1886:173b-24: de la mi bskyod pa'i rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa'o //
T02D1886:173b-25: rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa'o //
T02D1886:173b-26: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi nor bu ljang gu'o //
T02D1886:173b-27: 'od dpag tu med pa'i padma dmar po'o //
T02D1886:173b-28: don yod grub pa'i ral gyi ljang gu'o //
T02D1886:173b-29: spyan ma'i 'bras bu nag po'i mig dkar po gnyis so //
T02D1886:173b-30: m'a ma k'i rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga'o //
T02D1886:173b-31: gos dkar mo'i padma dmar po'o //
T02D1886:173b-37: chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi me long dkar po dang /
T02D1886:173b-38: dri za'i pi wang sngon po dang /
T02D1886:173b-41: kha dog sna tshogs pa'i gos dang /
T02D1886:173b-42: chos 'byung dkar por nams rim bzhin du dgod par bya'o //
T02D1886:173b-46: bgegs mthar byed rnams kyi rdo rje thob ba sngon po dang ;
T02D1886:173b-47: rdo rje dbyug pa dkar po dang /
T02D1886:173b-49: rdo rje sngon po kha bye ba rnams so //
T02D1886:173b-50: las thams cad pa'i bum pa ni /
T02D1886:173b-53: sna tshogs pa'i padma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D1886:173b-54: rnams par snang mdzad kyi dang lha mo bcu rnams
T02D1886:174a-2: gzhan rnams kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la'o //
T02D1886:174a-3: de'i nang nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa shin
T02D1886:174a-4: tu che ba nag nog dang mi gtsang ba med
T02D1886:174a-7: mtshan ma legs par bris la gos legs pa gnyis kyis kye ba dkris pa /
T02D1886:174a-8: aa mra'i yal ga la sogs pas brgyan pa /
T02D1886:174a-21: rnam par rgyal ba dkar po dang /
T02D1886:174a-24: / rin po che sna lnga dang /
T02D1886:174a-26: sman sna lnga lto ba'i nang du rab tu bcug nas /
T02D1886:174a-27: dri zhim po'i chus yongs su gang bar bya'o //
T02D1886:174a-28: de'i steng du dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgoms nas /
T02D1886:174a-30: zhabs bsil la sogs pa phul te /
T02D1886:174a-31: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi zhu ba'i gzugs blo yis bcug nas /
T02D1886:174a-32: de'i rjes su me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa'i rdo rje steng du yang dag par bzhag ste /
T02D1886:174a-33: rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad dam /
T02D1886:174a-34: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis mngon par bsngags bar bya'o //
T02D1886:174a-35: bum pa gzhan rnams kyang ji ltar rigs par dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i sngags kyis bya'o //
T02D1886:174a-36: me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pas yang dar par mchod de /
T02D1886:174a-37: gtor ma byin nas bstod pa bya ba ni /
T02D1886:174a-38: mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che //
T02D1886:174a-39: rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas chen po //
T02D1886:174a-40: rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum //
T02D1886:174a-41: rdo rje dbyings la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1886:174a-42: rnam par snang mdzad dga' chen po //
T02D1886:174a-43: rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che //
T02D1886:174a-44: rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi gnas //
T02D1886:174a-45: ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1886:174a-46: rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab //
T02D1886:174a-47: rdo rje nam mkha' 'dri ma med //
T02D1886:174a-48: rang bzhin dag pa gos pa med //
T02D1886:174a-49: rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1886:174a-50: rdo rje dpag med rgyal po che //
T02D1886:174a-51: mi rtog nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1886:174a-52: 'dod chags pha rol byin pa thob //
T02D1886:174a-53: rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1886:174a-54: rdo rje don yod rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D1886:174a-55: bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa //
T02D1886:174a-56: rang bzhin dag pa yang dag gyur //
T02D1886:174a-57: rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1886:174b-0: @174b ces bya ba brjod de dril bu dkor la bar bya'o //
T02D1886:174b-1: bum pa lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1886:174b-2: de'i 'og tu dkyil 'khor byas pa'i slob ma rnams me tog gi phreng ba bzung ste /
T02D1886:174b-3: pus mo g-yas pa'i lhag ngas la btsugs nas /
T02D1886:174b-4: sngags kyi snod du rung ba rnams la 'di bsgrag par bya ste /
T02D1886:174b-5: kha cig gsang sngags grub don gnyer //
T02D1886:174b-7: bsod nams 'dod pas de las gzhan //
T02D1886:174b-8: gzhan dag 'jig rten mchog don gnyer //
T02D1886:174b-9: 'jig rten mchog don gnyer pa yis //
T02D1886:174b-10: dad pa mang du byed pa yis //
T02D1886:174b-15: 'jig rten pha rol don gnyer nas //
T02D1886:174b-17: slob med rnams boo yis rang gi lus la bcug nas /
T02D1886:174b-18: rdo rje'i lam nas phyung nas /
T02D1886:174b-19: rang 'od kyi rig ma'i padma la gnas par bsams
T02D1886:174b-20: la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhu ba'i ngo
T02D1886:174b-21: bos dbang bskur nas dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgor bzhag
T02D1886:174b-22: ste / 'jug pa'i don du gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1886:174b-23: khyod ni ston pa dpal chen po //
T02D1886:174b-24: m'a ma k'i dang bdag sbyor ba'i //
T02D1886:174b-25: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02D1886:174b-26: byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa //
T02D1886:174b-27: dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol //
T02D1886:174b-28: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol //
T02D1886:174b-29: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang //
T02D1886:174b-30: skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol //
T02D1886:174b-31: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02D1886:174b-32: mgon po bdag ni gzhug tu gsol //
T02D1886:174b-34: slob ma gcig gtso bor byas nas /
T02D1886:174b-35: bu khyod tshur shor theg chen gyi //
T02D1886:174b-36: cho ga sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul //
T02D1886:174b-37: khyed la yang dag bshad pa bya //
T02D1886:174b-38: khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te //
T02D1886:174b-39: dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1886:174b-40: sku gsum thugs kyi rdo rje can //
T02D1886:174b-41: rdo rje sngags kyi mthu stobs kyis ;
T02D1886:174b-42: / ye shes mnyam med yang dag brnyes //
T02D1886:174b-43: gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de //
T02D1886:174b-44: sh'a kya seng sogs skyob pa yis //
T02D1886:174b-45: bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa /
T02D1886:174b-46: stobs chen dag kyang de yis bcom //
T02D1886:174b-47: 'jig rten rjes mthun gos nas ni //
T02D1886:175a-2: bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig / ces brjod par byas nas /
T02D1886:175a-3: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02D1886:175a-4: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
T02D1886:175a-5: bsod nams kun la rjes yi rang //
T02D1886:175a-6: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02D1886:175a-7: zhes bya bas gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02D1886:175a-10: zhes bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i snags kyis bsrung ba byas la /
T02D1886:175a-11: de rnams kyi snying ga dang /
T02D1886:175a-13: spyi bor zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje dang /
T02D1886:175a-15: 'khor lo'i lte ba la h'um a'a: aom rnam par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1886:175a-16: slob dpon yang la ngas te /
T02D1886:175a-17: g-yas ba'i hu tshur gyis rdo rje bzung bas /
T02D1886:175a-18: slob ma rnams kyi snying ga dang /
T02D1886:175a-20: spyi bor rdo rje yang dag par gtugs te /
T02D1886:175a-21: h'um a'a:aom zhes bya ba brjod nas so //
T02D1886:175a-22: me tog ni spyi bor ro //
T02D1886:175a-23: bdug spos dang mar me ni mdun du'o //
T02D1886:175a-24: de bzhin du dri ni snying gar byin par bya'o //
T02D1886:175a-25: de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags kyis mngon par bzlas pa'i so shing gas ba med pa /
T02D1886:175a-27: aa shva ta tha la sogs pa sor bcu gnyis
T02D1886:175a-28: kyi tshad tsa mor me tog gi phreng bas dkris
T02D1886:175a-29: pa slob ma rnams la sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1886:175a-30: de rnams kyis kyang shar phyogs su kha bltas pa'am /
T02D1886:175a-31: byang phyogs su kha bltas pas bca' ste /
T02D1886:175a-32: phyugs kyi go ba tsam byungs pa'i sa la bskur bar bya'o //
T02D1886:175a-33: de la zhi ba la sogs pa'i las bstan par bya ste /
T02D1886:175a-34: gang yang sngon du kha bltas lhung //
T02D1886:175a-35: mchog gi dngos grub der shes bya ;
T02D1886:175a-36: / de bzhin shar du rtse mo bltas //
T02D1886:175a-37: dngos grub 'bring du rab tu grags //
T02D1886:175a-38: de bzhin byang du kha bltas pa //
T02D1886:175a-40: gal te lho ru mngon phyogs pa //
T02D1886:175a-41: shin tu nag por de nas 'gyur //
T02D1886:175a-42: nub tu mngon par kha bltas pas //
T02D1886:175a-43: phra mo'i dngos grub de nas shes //
T02D1886:175a-44: de nas so shing bskyur ba las //
T02D1886:175a-45: gal te 'og tu kha bltas ltung //
T02D1886:175a-47: nges par the tshom med pa'o //
T02D1886:175a-48: de nas slob dpon gyis kha bshal ba chu khyor ba gsum blud par bya ste /
T02D1886:175a-49: aom hr'i:bi shuddha:sarbba dha rmam p'a pam ni shtsa sam sho dha ya /
T02D1886:175b-0: sarba @175b bi ka span aa pa na ya h'um /
T02D1886:175b-1: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis kha ba shal bar bya'o //
T02D1886:175b-2: yang de rnams 'dug tu bcug nas /
T02D1886:175b-3: ku shal bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags kyis mngon par
T02D1886:175b-4: bzlas te de rnams la stan dang sdang su byin
T02D1886:175b-5: nas / de nyid kyi sngags kyis mngon par bzlas pa /
T02D1886:175b-6: skud pa bsum sgril byas te /
T02D1886:175b-7: mdud pa gsum byas pa bsrung ba'i don du slob
T02D1886:175b-8: ma rnams kyis dpung ba g-yas pa la bcings te
T02D1886:175b-9: / chos bshad pas spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1886:175b-10: 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams //
T02D1886:175b-11: au du mtha' ra'i me tog bzhin //
T02D1886:175b-12: brgya lam nas ni ris 'ga' zhig //
T02D1886:175b-14: gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba //
T02D1886:175b-15: de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste //
T02D1886:175b-16: gang gis sems can mnyam med don //
T02D1886:175b-17: mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus //
T02D1886:175b-18: bskal ba byed ba du ma ru //
T02D1886:175b-19: sdig pa bgyis par gyur pa gang //
T02D1886:175b-22: grags pa mtha' yas sngas spyod pa'i //
T02D1886:175b-23: tshul la gnas pa smos ci dgos //
T02D1886:175b-24: gang dag spyod pa mchog 'di la //
T02D1886:175b-25: blo gros shin tu mig g-yo ba //
T02D1886:175b-26: deng bdag gis ni ngan 'gro'i rgyun //
T02D1886:175b-27: sdug bsngal kun 'byung rab tu bcad //
T02D1886:175b-28: bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis ;
T02D1886:175b-29: / rnyed pa mnyam de ring rnyed //
T02D1886:175b-30: gang phyir rgyal ba sras pas bas //
T02D1886:175b-31: bdag nyid chen po kun gyis ni //
T02D1886:175b-32: bstan pa 'di ni khyed rnams kun //
T02D1886:175b-33: yongs su bzung ste skye bzhin pa'o //
T02D1886:175b-34: de phyir khyed rnams theg chen la //
T02D1886:175b-35: sang ni rab tu skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1886:175b-36: theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i ;
T02D1886:175b-37: / lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan //
T02D1886:175b-38: khyed rnams der ni dngos bas na //
T02D1886:175b-39: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur //
T02D1886:175b-40: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i chos bshad cing bsgrags nas //
T02D1886:175b-41: de rnams bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags kyis yang dag par bsrungs la /
T02D1886:175b-42: sngon pa'i bye brag gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1886:175b-43: phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i dbang //
T02D1886:175b-44: byin nas mgon po bdag la gsungs //
T02D1886:175b-45: dkyil 'khor lha yi de nyid dang //
T02D1886:175b-46: slob dpon gyi ni las rnams dang //
T02D1886:175b-47: sangs rgyas rnams kyi dam tshig dang //
T02D1886:175b-48: gsang ba'i sdom pa bla na med //
T02D1886:175b-49: sems can rnams kyi don byed phyir //
T02D1886:176a-0: rtag tu bdag ni slob dpon @176a * //
T02D1886:176a-3: slob ma de rnams ku sha'i stan la nyal du bcug ste /
T02D1886:176a-4: rmi lam lam ci mthong ba nga la zlos shig ces bya'o /
T02D1886:176a-5: slob ma lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D1886:176a-6: yang dkyil 'khor gyi khang par slob dpon zhugs gnas
T02D1886:176a-7: bsrung ba'i don du bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags bzlas
T02D1886:176a-8: par bya'o // gtor ma yang byin nas //
T02D1886:176a-10: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis nang par snga bar phyir byung nas slob pa ma de rnams bos te /
T02D1886:176a-11: de rnams kyi rmi lam dge ba'am //
T02D1886:176a-13: gal gte rmi lam mi dge na bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D1886:176a-14: de nas bris sku la sogs pa'i skyil 'khor la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas /
T02D1886:176a-15: rang gi lha'i rnal sbyor sngon du song bas /
T02D1886:176a-16: rang nyid kyis slob ma 'jug pa'i cho gas zhugs nas /
T02D1886:176a-17: de nas 'og nas 'byung ba bzhin du rjes su
T02D1886:176a-18: gnas pa'i dbang gi bar bcom ldan 'das gtso bo
T02D1886:176a-20: de nas slob ma rnams gzhug par bya ba'i don du bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs gsol bar bya'o //
T02D1886:176a-21: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste /
T02D1886:176a-22: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02D1886:176a-23: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02D1886:176a-24: rgyu dang las las kun du 'byung //
T02D1886:176a-25: de bzhin nyid las nges par skyes //
T02D1886:176a-27: gzugs brnyan lta bu slob mas ni //
T02D1886:176a-28: gsal shing sdig med mthong bar shog //
T02D1886:176a-29: ces bya bas bden pa'i byin gyis rlabs gsol nas //
T02D1886:176a-30: yol ba las phyi rol du yong byin ba'i slob
T02D1886:176a-31: ma dbang bskur ba ni snod du bya ba'i phyir
T02D1886:176a-32: // rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs su nye bar dmigs la /
T02D1886:176a-34: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis med tog gi phreng ba
T02D1886:176a-35: gzung ba gdong g-yogs kyis dkris pa bum pa'i chus
T02D1886:176a-36: gtor ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i don du dri
T02D1886:176a-37: bar bya'o // kye khyod gang la dga' zhes bya /
T02D1886:176a-38: bde ba chen po bdag ni skal ba bzang po la zhes bya'o //
T02D1886:176a-39: slob ma'i snying gar rdo rje bzhag nas /
T02D1886:176a-40: aom sarbba yo ga tsitta autp'a da y'a mi //
T02D1886:176a-41: su ra te sa ma ya stvam ho : siddhi badzra ya th'a su kham /
T02D1886:176a-42: zhes bya ba 'dis byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas brjod par bya ste /
T02D1886:176b-0: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis @176b brlab par 'gyur ro //
T02D1886:176b-1: khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog
T02D1886:176b-2: tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams
T02D1886:176b-3: la brjod par mi bya zhing mi dad par byang
T02D1886:176b-4: mi bya'o // h'um dza: h'um zhes bya ba 'dis
T02D1886:176b-5: bkug ste yol ba'i nang du bcu gnas kyil 'khor
T02D1886:176b-6: gyi shar gyis gor yang dag par bzhag ste /
T02D1886:176b-8: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyi //
T02D1886:176b-9: de'i phyir ngar khyod la rdo rje'i ye shes bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1886:176b-10: ye shes gang gis khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur na /
T02D1886:176b-11: dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos khyod kyis
T02D1886:176b-12: dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du brjod
T02D1886:176b-13: par ma byed cig dam tshig nyams par gyur ta
T02D1886:176b-14: re / yang slob ma'i spyi bor rdo rje gzhag la brjod par bya ste /
T02D1886:176b-15: 'di ni dam tshig rdo rje ste /
T02D1886:176b-16: gal te la lar khyod 'di smras //
T02D1886:176b-17: khyod ni spyi bo 'gas par byed //
T02D1886:176b-18: me tog dang bcas pa'i rdo rje snying gar gzhag la brjod par bya ste /
T02D1886:176b-19: aom rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi /
T02D1886:176b-20: snying la yang dag zhugs par gyur //
T02D1886:176b-21: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02D1886:176b-22: de ma thag tu dral nas gshegs //
T02D1886:176b-23: 'dis mna' bsgags nas bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga padma'i
T02D1886:176b-24: snod la gnas pa'i yi ge gsum gyis brlabs la
T02D1886:176b-25: // aom badzra aa mri ti da ya h'um tha:
T02D1886:176b-26: zhes bya ba'i 'dis lan bdun bzlas pa byas nas
T02D1886:176b-27: // / 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal pa'i chu //
T02D1886:176b-29: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ster //
T02D1886:176b-30: rdo rje bdud rtsi chu 'thungs shig //
T02D1886:176b-31: ces brjod la blud par bya'o ;
T02D1886:176b-32: / de nas 'di brjod par bya ste //
T02D1886:176b-33: deng phyin chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis /
T02D1886:176b-35: ngas 'di gyis shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de yang khyod kyis bya dgos so //
T02D1886:176b-36: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig mi
T02D1886:176b-37: bde ba ma spangs par khyad 'chi ba'i dus byas
T02D1886:176b-38: nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur te zhes brjod bas
T02D1886:176b-39: dam tshig gi chu sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1886:176b-40: de nas slob mas 'di ltar brjod du gzhug ste /
T02D1886:176b-41: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob
T02D1886:176b-42: la rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la dbab tu gsol
T02D1886:176b-43: zhes bya'o // de nas slob ma'i snying gar lam ser po yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1886:177a-1: las mtshan pa'i dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa la yi ge h'um gnas pa'o //
T02D1886:177a-2: spyi bor bam yig las skyes pa'i bum pas mtshan
T02D1886:177a-3: pa'i chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po dkar po la ye
T02D1886:177a-5: mgrin par yam yig las skyes ba g-yo ba'i ba
T02D1886:177a-6: dan gnyis kyis mtshan pa'i du ba'i mdog can gzhu'i
T02D1886:177a-7: rnam pa lta bu rlung gi dkyil 'khor la yi
T02D1886:177a-9: rkang pa'i mthil du rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis sbar
T02D1886:177a-10: ba'i gru gsum pa 'od zer 'phro ba'i me'i dkyil
T02D1886:177a-11: 'khor la yi ge dzgham : gnas pa'i 'od zer
T02D1886:177a-13: dregs pa dang bcas pa'i dril bu dkrol la //
T02D1886:177a-14: a'a be sha ya stvam bha ya ra ra ra
T02D1886:177a-15: ra ts'a la ya h'um ha: aa: dzheem: zhes brjod
T02D1886:177a-16: nas le la yi ge a'a: dmar po bsams nas
T02D1886:177a-17: 'od dpag tu me dpa'i gzugs su sgom par bya'o
T02D1886:177a-18: // babs nas bu khyod dge dang mi dge smos zhes bya ba brjod do //
T02D1886:177a-19: smra bshes nas aom tishtha badzra //
T02D1886:177a-21: khyod kyi mig la ci snying ci mthong zhes dris nas /
T02D1886:177a-22: de nas de yis brjod de //
T02D1886:177a-23: dkar po dang ser pa dang/ ma ri po dang /
T02D1886:177a-28: mngon spyod kyi dngos grub kyi snod dang ldan par
T02D1886:177a-29: brjod nas bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs brjod par bya
T02D1886:177a-30: ste / de ltar dkyil 'khor yang dag 'dir //
T02D1886:177a-31: bdag gis slob ma gzhug pa la //
T02D1886:177a-32: ji ltar bsod nams de bzhin shog / lha rnams kyi ni rigs kyi rim //
T02D1886:177a-33: ji ltar dngos gru rim pa 'di //
T02D1886:177a-34: gang gi rigs kyis snod yin la //
T02D1886:177a-35: ji ltar bsod nams mthu yis ni //
T02D1886:177a-37: de nas me tog gi phreng ba de //
T02D1886:177a-38: pra ti'i tstsha badzra ho: zhes bya ba 'di yis dkyil 'khor la bsgyur bar bya'o //
T02D1886:177a-39: de nas me tog lhung ba la //
T02D1886:177a-42: mchog gi dngos grub mtshon par bya'o //
T02D1886:177a-43: de la gal gte sangs rgyas rnams kyi dbu'i spyi
T02D1886:177a-44: gtsug gi dpral bar babs nas des phyag rgya chen
T02D1886:177a-46: gal te spyan nam zhal la babs de sngags kyi dngos grub bo //
T02D1886:177a-47: yan lag mchog la ni mchog go //
T02D1886:177a-48: yan lag bring la ni 'bring ngo //
T02D1886:177a-49: smad kyi cha la ni tha ma'o //
T02D1886:177b-0: gzugs las shin tu ring bar @177b babs na phran tshegs so //
T02D1886:177b-1: snye ba ni dngos grub myur dug 'gyur myur du 'grub pa'o //
T02D1886:177b-2: lha rnams kyi rang gi re'u mig gi gnas la rnam par dpyad pa'i phyir shes par bya'o //
T02D1886:177b-3: gal te lha gnyis kyis dbus su lhung na /
T02D1886:177b-4: de'i tshe me tog gang dang nye bar babs pa de'i rigs yin no //
T02D1886:177b-5: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du babs na phran tshegs kyi dngos grub bo //
T02D1886:177b-6: gal te dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams kyi phyi rol la babs na //
T02D1886:177b-7: de'i tshe yang bskyur du gzhug go //
T02D1886:177b-8: lan gsum du byas te de la de nyid du babs na dngos grub med de //
T02D1886:177b-9: phyi'i rdo rje ba'i phyi rol du lhung na dngos grub med do //
T02D1886:177b-10: nang du babs na shin tu dka' bas so zhes bya ba ni me tog bskyur ba'i cho gya'o //
T02D1886:177b-11: de nas yang me tog phreng ba de yang blangs snas //
T02D1886:177b-12: slob ma'i spyi bor bcing bar bya ste /
T02D1886:177b-13: pra ti grihna stam mi mam sa tva ma h'a ba la //
T02D1886:177b-15: mig gnyis la yi ge aom bsams nas /
T02D1886:177b-16: rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi /
T02D1886:177b-17: mig 'byed pa la brtson par mdzad //
T02D1886:177b-18: mig ni thams cad 'byed mdzad de //
T02D1886:177b-19: rdo rje'i mig ni blangs na med //
T02D1886:177b-20: ces bya ba brjod nas gsong g-yogs dgrol ba bya'o //
T02D1886:177b-21: de nas dkyil 'khor bstan par bya ste /
T02D1886:177b-22: dbus su rnam par shes pa'i phung po mi bskyod
T02D1886:177b-23: pa shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su gzugs ni rnam
T02D1886:177b-25: tshor ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan no /
T02D1886:177b-26: 'du shes ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02D1886:177b-27: 'du byed ni don yongs grub pa'o //
T02D1886:177b-28: me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su sa'i khams ni spyan ma'o //
T02D1886:177b-29: chu'i ka'i khyams ni m'a ma ka'i'o //
T02D1886:177b-30: me'i khams ni gos dkar mo'o //
T02D1886:177b-31: rlung gi khams ni sgrol ma'o //
T02D1886:177b-32: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi me la sogs pa'i mtshams bzhin
T02D1886:177b-33: dang shar phyogs kyi sgo'i mtshams rnam sus gzugs rdo
T02D1886:177b-34: rje ma dang / sgra rdo rje ma dang /
T02D1886:177b-37: reg bya rdo rje ma dang /
T02D1886:177b-38: chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma'o //
T02D1886:177b-40: padma mthar byed dang shes rab mthar byed dang //
T02D1886:177b-41: bgegs mthar byed rnams ni shar la sogs pa'i sgor
T02D1886:177b-42: gnas pa'o zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor du 'jug
T02D1886:177b-43: pa'i cho ga'o // da ni dbang bskur ba'i cho ga brjod par bya ste /
T02D1886:177b-44: byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1886:177b-45: mchod chen ji ltar byin pa ltar //
T02D1886:178a-2: nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag gsol //
T02D1886:178a-3: zhes gya bas gsol ba gdab pa dang ldan pa'i slob ma mi bskyod pa'i gzugs su dmigs nas //
T02D1886:178a-4: rang rig skyes bu'i chu yi ni //
T02D1886:178a-5: kun du bum pa'i rgyan rnams kyis //
T02D1886:178a-6: dbang bskur rdo rje can bsams nas //
T02D1886:178a-7: rdo rje thugs ni rab tu bsgom //
T02D1886:178a-8: rdo rje dang bcas pa'i khu tshur gyis chu blangs nas /
T02D1886:178a-9: dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje chen //
T02D1886:178a-10: khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa //
T02D1886:178a-11: gsang ba gsum las byung ba yi //
T02D1886:178a-12: sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya //
T02D1886:178a-13: aom badzra aa bhi shinyts'a mi stvam //
T02D1886:178a-15: slob ma 'khor los sgyur pa bzhin du dbang bskur
T02D1886:178a-16: bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni chu'i dbang bskur ba'i
T02D1886:178a-17: cho ga ste // me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
T02D1886:178a-18: de nas gong du bstan pa'i rim pas gser ram
T02D1886:178a-19: gos la sogs pa las byas pa'i dbu rgyan rin
T02D1886:178a-20: chen 'byung ldan gyi sbyor bas slob ma'i mgo la
T02D1886:178a-21: sbyin par bya'o // aom sarbba buddha tsu da m'a
T02D1886:178a-22: ni ma h'a ma gu tam pra ti'i tstsha badzra
T02D1886:178a-23: ho: nam mkha'i khams kyi yongs su gtogs pa'i de
T02D1886:178a-24: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rig skyi bdag po'i gzugs
T02D1886:178a-25: kyi dbu brgyan la nye bar gnas pa bsams par
T02D1886:178a-26: bya'o zhes bya ba ni dbu rgyan gyi dbang ba
T02D1886:178a-28: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
T02D1886:178a-29: de nas rdo rje rtse lnga pa chen po lag
T02D1886:178a-30: pas snying gar bzhag / slob ma 'jig rten dbang
T02D1886:178a-31: 'dra zhing // rdo rje sems dpa' zhes dbang bskur //
T02D1886:178a-32: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang /
T02D1886:178a-33: de ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
T02D1886:178a-34: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1886:178a-35: dngos grub phyir na rdo rje long //
T02D1886:178a-37: rdo rje snying ga la sogs par gtugs nas /
T02D1886:178a-38: lag pa g-yas par rdo rje sbyin par bya'o zhes
T02D1886:178a-39: bya ba ni rdo rje'i dbang gi cho ga ste
T02D1886:178a-40: / so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1886:178a-41: de nas don yod grub pa'i gzugs su dmigs na /
T02D1886:178a-42: lag pa g-yon pas dril bu byin la slob ma
T02D1886:178a-43: rdo rje dril bu dang ldan pa'i lag pa gnyis
T02D1886:178a-44: kyis 'khyud pa'i rnam par ltar byas nas /
T02D1886:178a-45: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti tvam aa bhi shi
T02D1886:178a-46: nyts'a mi tishtha badzra ma h'a sa ma ya stvi
T02D1886:178a-47: // zhes bya ba ni dril bu'i dbang gi cho ga ste //
T02D1886:178a-48: bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes so //
T02D1886:178a-49: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs su dmigs nas /
T02D1886:178b-0: ming gi dbang bskur @178b bar bya ste /
T02D1886:178b-1: mgo bor rdo rje dril bu bzhag nas /
T02D1886:178b-2: aom badzra satva tvam aa bhi shinytsa mi badzra n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta:/
T02D1886:178b-3: kye dpal zhes dang rdo rje //
T02D1886:178b-4: kye dpal gti mug rdo rje //
T02D1886:178b-5: kye dpal nga rgyal rdo rje //
T02D1886:178b-7: kye dpal phrag dog rdo rje zhes bya ba la
T02D1886:178b-8: sogs pa rigs dang rjes su mthun pa'i ngo bo
T02D1886:178b-10: mi bskyod pa ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang //
T02D1886:178b-12: dga' ba'i rdo rje dang/ sgeg pa'i rdo rje dang /
T02D1886:178b-17: snying rje stobs kyi rdo rje pa //
T02D1886:178b-18: thugs kyi rdo rje zhes brjod do //
T02D1886:178b-19: rnam par snang mdzad kyi ni rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje dang //
T02D1886:178b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje dang /
T02D1886:178b-26: sku'i rdo rje zhes mngon par brjod do //
T02D1886:178b-27: rin che 'byung ldan gyi ni rin chen rdo rje dang /
T02D1886:178b-28: yid bzhin nor bu rdo rje dang /
T02D1886:178b-34: nga rgyal rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan to //
T02D1886:178b-35: 'od dpag med kyi ni 'dod chags rdo rje dang /
T02D1886:178b-36: spyan nas gzigs rdo rje dang //
T02D1886:178b-39: shes rab myu gu rdo rje dang /
T02D1886:178b-40: bde ba'i myu gu rdo rje dang /
T02D1886:178b-41: snying rje myu gu rdo rje dang /
T02D1886:178b-42: padma'i myu gu rdo rje dang /
T02D1886:178b-44: dga' ba de'i rdo rje dang /
T02D1886:178b-45: ngag gi rdo rje zhes bya bar brjod do //
T02D1886:178b-47: don yod grub pa rdo rje dang /
T02D1886:178b-50: pha rol tu phyin pa'i rdo rje dang /
T02D1886:178b-52: phrag dog rdo rje zhes brjod do //
T02D1886:178b-54: mchog gi dang po'i rdo rje dang /
T02D1886:178b-55: mi mnyam pa'i rdo rje dang /
T02D1886:178b-58: rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje dang /
T02D1886:178b-59: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dang /
T02D1886:178b-60: mi g-yo ba'i rdo rje dang /
T02D1886:178b-62: yan lag med pa'i rdo rje dang /
T02D1886:178b-64: lhan cig skyes pa'i rdo rje dang zhes bya bar rab tu grags pa'o //
T02D1886:178b-65: mi bskyod pa'i rim gyis bud med rnams la ni /
T02D1886:178b-67: phyag na rdo rje ma dang /
T02D1886:178b-68: rdo rje phreng ba ma dang /
T02D1886:179a-0: rdo rje m'a ma k'i zhes @179a * //
T02D1886:179a-2: rnam par snang mdzad kyi ni //
T02D1886:179a-7: rdo rje 'khyud ma zhes brjod do //
T02D1886:179a-12: rdo rje phreng ba ma zhes brjod do //
T02D1886:179a-16: ngo mtshar bde ba'i rdo rje ma dang /
T02D1886:179a-21: rdo rje gos dkar mo zhes brjod do //
T02D1886:179a-23: rdo rje snying so ma dang /
T02D1886:179a-25: rdo rje tho ba mo dang /
T02D1886:179a-26: rdo rje sgrol ma zhes brjod do //
T02D1886:179a-28: rdo rje rol ma dang rdo rje ma gyog sma dang /
T02D1886:179a-30: rdo rje ka nga ka ma dang /
T02D1886:179a-31: rdo rje lbu ba ma dang /
T02D1886:179a-33: rdo rje m'a ma k'i zhes brjod do //
T02D1886:179a-34: ming gi dbang bskur ba'i cho ga ste /
T02D1886:179a-35: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes sos //
T02D1886:179a-36: dbang bskur ba 'di rnams kyi sngags dang rgyud nyan pa dang /
T02D1886:179a-38: sngags sgrub pa la dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1886:179a-39: dbang lnga po nyid ni rig pa'i dbang zhes brjod do //
T02D1886:179a-40: rnam pa thams cad du spyan ma la sogs pa'i
T02D1886:179a-41: rig ma'i bya ba 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes bya'o
T02D1886:179a-43: kye rdo rje slob dpon dbang bskur ba /
T02D1886:179a-44: gang gis khyod kyi drin gyis bdag //
T02D1886:179a-45: rang dang gzhan don nus gyur ba'i //
T02D1886:179a-46: snying rje'i gter gyis bdag la stsol //
T02D1886:179a-47: zhes bya bas gsol ba btab pa dang ldan pa'i slob ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ;
T02D1886:179a-50: bla re blang bar bya ste /
T02D1886:179a-51: shar sgor seng ge'i khri la snags tshogs kyi padma la gnas pa'i 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du //
T02D1886:179a-52: rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su dmigs nas h'um yig las skyes pa'i rdo rje bsgoms te /
T02D1886:179a-53: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D1886:179a-54: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba chen //
T02D1886:179a-55: kun du bzang po thams cad bdag /
T02D1886:179a-56: rdo rje snyems ma gtso bo'i gtso //
T02D1886:179a-57: mchog gi dang po skyes bu bcom ldan 'das //
T02D1886:179a-58: zhes bya ba de nyid kyis rdo rje'i 'dzin du bzhugs so //
T02D1886:179a-59: de nas aa yig la skyes pa'i dril bu ste /
T02D1886:179a-60: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad ni //
T02D1886:179b-0: shes rab @179b dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad //
T02D1886:179b-1: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02D1886:179b-2: byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhes //
T02D1886:179b-3: ces bya bas g-yon pa'i lag gtu sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1886:179b-4: srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag //
T02D1886:179b-5: ngo bo nyid kyis srid par byas //
T02D1886:179b-6: ngo bo nyid dag sems dpa' mchog //
T02D1886:179b-7: srid pa mchog tu byed par 'gyur ;
T02D1886:179b-8: / zhes bya bas kyang slob mas dkrol bar ba'o //
T02D1886:179b-9: de nas phyag rgya'i dam tshig brjod par bya ste /
T02D1886:179b-10: yid kyis sku ni ston pa'i phyir //
T02D1886:179b-11: gang gis thams cad skur bstan la //
T02D1886:179b-12: de na phyag rgyar rab tu grags //
T02D1886:179b-13: zhes bya ba 'dis rab 'dod pa'i lha'i skur phyag
T02D1886:179b-14: rgya'i chen por byin gyis brlabs nas 'khyud par bya'o
T02D1886:179b-15: // de nas slob dpon gyis rang gi snying ga'i
T02D1886:179b-16: sa bon las byung ba'i lha'i tshogs nam mkha' la
T02D1886:179b-17: gnas pas dbang bskur bar bsams nas //
T02D1886:179b-18: dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che /
T02D1886:179b-19: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa //
T02D1886:179b-20: gsang ba gsum las byung ba ni //
T02D1886:179b-21: sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya //
T02D1886:179b-23: phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur pa'i tshigs bcad rnams kyi dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D1886:179b-24: aom su pra tishtha tva badzre //
T02D1886:179b-25: zhes brjod de zhu ba'i zhabs la mi bskyod pas rgyas btab par bsam //
T02D1886:179b-27: shes rab bcu drug lon pa la ;
T02D1886:179b-28: / lag pa gnyis kyis 'khyud nas su //
T02D1886:179b-29: rdo rje dril bu mnyam sbyar bas /
T02D1886:179b-30: slob dpon dbang du 'od pa yin //
T02D1886:179b-31: de nas mdor bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi de nyid dang /
T02D1886:179b-32: dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par dag pa brjod par bya ste /
T02D1886:179b-34: yid kyi 'khor lo mchog yin te /
T02D1886:179b-35: ye shes zhes bya gzhal yas khang //
T02D1886:179b-36: sems kyi gzhal yas mthun po ste //
T02D1886:179b-37: phung po lnga ni mdor bsdus ni //
T02D1886:179b-38: sangs rgyas lngar ni rab tu grags //
T02D1886:179b-39: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1886:179b-40: de nas slob ma rnam par snang mdzad la sgo pa'i gzugs su dmigs nas /
T02D1886:179b-41: rjes su gnang ba sbyin par bya ste /
T02D1886:179b-42: sems can kun la phan don du //
T02D1886:179b-43: 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du //
T02D1886:179b-44: ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs kyis //
T02D1886:179b-45: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyis //
T02D1886:179b-46: chos kyi gnas su rdo rje dang /
T02D1886:179b-47: rin po che dang padma dang /
T02D1886:180a-0: las kyis sgra rab tu gzhug par byas @180a * //
T02D1886:180a-1: la rim gyis tshigs bcad lngas rjes su gnang ba sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1886:180a-2: de nas ma'i bskyod pa'i gzugs su dmigs nas rdo rje'o brtul zhugs sbyin par bya ste /

T02D1886:183a-15: bde ba chen po yang dag gzung //
T02D1886:183a-16: ji snyed byang chub bar du ni //
T02D1886:183a-17: sems can don gyis rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1886:183a-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa de ltar yin na
T02D1886:183a-19: rnam pa gsum gyi bye brag ji ltar gsungs she
T02D1886:183a-20: na / rgyu dang 'bras bu dbyer med cing //
T02D1886:183a-21: sngon ma gsum du rab tu grags //
T02D1886:183a-22: dga' bral dga' ba'i dbus nyid du ;
T02D1886:183a-23: / zhi ba'i rnam par gsal phyir ro //
T02D1886:183a-24: de gnyis dbus su ji ltar gsal ba yin zhe na /
T02D1886:183a-25: mchog mtha' dga' bral dbus nyid kyi //
T02D1886:183a-26: stong las stong nyid rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1886:183a-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gis so //
T02D1886:183a-28: stong las stong nyid gang yin zhes //
T02D1886:183a-29: thog ma tha ma med zhi ba //
T02D1886:183a-30: dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid gtso //
T02D1886:183a-31: stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa //
T02D1886:183a-32: byang chub sems zhes rab tu dran //
T02D1886:183a-33: zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha' yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1886:183a-34: 'di ni thabs gang gis ji ltar skyed par byed ce na /
T02D1886:183a-36: bdag byin brlab ba'i rim pa yis ;
T02D1886:183a-37: / zhes bya ba rgyas par 'dir bdag gis ma bkrol te /
T02D1886:183a-39: ye shes 'di ni rang rig pa //
T02D1886:183a-40: ngag gi spyod yul las 'das shing //
T02D1886:183a-41: rang byin brlab pa'i rim pa 'di //
T02D1886:183a-42: kun mkhyen ye shes de bdag nyid //
T02D1886:183a-44: gzhan gyis brjod min lhan cig skyes //
T02D1886:183a-45: gang du btsal yang mi rnyed pa //
T02D1886:183a-46: bla ma brgyud pa'i rim bsten dang //
T02D1886:183a-47: rang gi bsod nams kyis rtogs so //
T02D1886:183a-48: bla ma'i zhabs kyi drin gyis dang //
T02D1886:183a-49: bsod nams chen po ldan rnams rang //
T02D1886:183a-50: ye shes skad cig gis bskyed 'gyur //
T02D1886:183a-51: ngag gi spyod yul las 'das pa'o //
T02D1886:183b-1: bde chen rgyal po gcig pu rgyal ba ste /
T02D1886:183b-2: rgyu 'bras rtag tu 'gro ba rnams la 'char //
T02D1886:183b-3: gang yang rjod par byed pa'i dus na ni //
T02D1886:183b-4: thams cad mkhyen pa ngag gis 'phongs par 'gyur //
T02D1886:183b-5: sa ra ha yis gang gsungs pa //
T02D1886:183b-6: bla mas ngag gis mi brjod cing //
T02D1886:183b-7: slob mas kyang ni go ba min //
T02D1886:183b-8: 'gro kun lhan cig skyes pa'i bdud rtsi'i bcud //
T02D1886:183b-9: gang la bzla zhing ci ni bzla bar bya //
T02D1886:183b-10: blo yi spyod yul ma yin phyir //
T02D1886:183b-11: ngag gis brjod par mi nus so //
T02D1886:183b-12: bla mas gsungs pa dngos po 'jug pas ring spyad do //
T02D1886:183b-13: de ni rim gyis snying rje la sogs yon tan ldan //
T02D1886:183b-14: dad ldan de yi snying la rang nyid skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1886:183b-15: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid ji ltar yin zhe na /
T02D1886:183b-16: dbang po nyid ni ldog gyur zhing //
T02D1886:183b-17: yid ni nang du chud pa dang //
T02D1886:183b-18: sems dpa' nyams pa rab snang zhing //
T02D1886:183b-19: lus ni dam pa'i bde ba myong //
T02D1886:183b-20: dbang po'i tshogs ni nang du nub 'gyur zhing //
T02D1886:183b-21: rnam rtog nyams pas srid pa'i sa bon mi 'thob pa //
T02D1886:183b-22: dga' ba'i 'od kyis rang bzhin 'di nyid ni //
T02D1886:183b-23: nam mkha' dang nyam ngo mtshar bsil zhing zhim //
T02D1886:183b-24: gang la dbang po zhu 'gyur zhing //
T02D1886:183b-25: rang gi bdag nyid nyams 'gyur ba //
T02D1886:183b-26: de ni lhan cig skyes dga' ste //
T02D1886:183b-27: gsal bar bla ma'i zhabs la dris //
T02D1886:183b-28: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1886:183b-29: dus mnyam dag tu yul dang dbang po rnam gnyis ni //
T02D1886:183b-30: gang zhig skyes shing nub pa de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1886:183b-31: gang yang mngon dga' rgyal ba mdzes pa'i sku gcig po //
T02D1886:183b-32: mkhas pa rnams kyi snying la gsal zhing sad par
T02D1886:183b-33: 'dug / de'i phyir rnam par rtog pa thams cad
T02D1886:183b-34: rab bcom zhing ; / gang 'dir blo yis dam pa'i bde 'dod pa //
T02D1886:183b-35: de yang bya ba byas pa'i mkhas pa ste //
T02D1886:183b-36: gzhan ni rkang gnyis pa yi phyugs yin no //
T02D1886:183b-38: rgyas par brjod pa re zhig des chog go //
T02D1886:183b-39: de'i phyir bla ma dam pa yang dag par mnyes par byas nas /
T02D1886:183b-40: dam pa'i slob mas sku gsum du nang du rtogs
T02D1886:183b-41: pa'i bde ba chen po'i ngo bo nyid rang rig
T02D1886:183b-42: par bya'o zhes bya ba ni dam pa'i dbang po
T02D1886:183b-43: thob pa'o // bya ba byas nas 'di brjod par bya ste //
T02D1886:183b-44: deng bdag skye ba 'bras bur bcas //
T02D1886:183b-45: bdag gtso 'bras bu dang ldan yin //
T02D1886:183b-46: di ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
T02D1886:183b-47: bdag ni di ring sangs rgyas sras //
T02D1886:184a-2: bla ma de la dbul bar bya //
T02D1886:184a-3: sna tshogs rgyan dang gos la sogs //
T02D1886:184a-4: khyad par du yang rang gi lus //
T02D1886:184a-6: de nas sbyin sreg bya zhing gtor ma byin nas /
T02D1886:184a-7: tshogs kyi 'khor lo rab tu bya //
T02D1886:184a-8: dge 'dun ston mo byas nas ni //
T02D1886:184a-9: sdug bsngal skyabs med tshim par bya //
T02D1886:184a-10: dbang bskur ba yi cho ga mdor bsdus byas pa las //
T02D1886:184a-11: gang gis bsod nams dpag med thob par gyur ba ste //
T02D1886:184a-12: de yis gnyis med bsam mi khyab pa bde chen
T02D1886:184a-13: bdag / rang byung rdo rje 'dzin pa skye 'gros
T02D1886:184a-14: thob par shog / mdor bsdus pa'i dbang gi rab
T02D1886:184a-15: tu byed pa // slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal dga' ba'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1886:184a-17: // / gzhung tshad ni tshigs bcad sum brgya ste bam po gcig go //
T02D1886:184a-18: tho ling gi gtsug lag khang du rje mnga' bdag btsan po rtse lde btsan gyi bka' lung gis /
T02D1886:184a-19: rgya gar gyi mkhan bo mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad dang /
